caption: This song is an instrumental interlude of the Gospel song ‘Thorns in the Straw. The music is slow with a melancholic trombone and tuba harmony, acoustic guitar accompaniment , bass, steady drumming,and synthesiser arrangements. The music is soft, mellow, poignant,pensive, sentimental,emotional, reflective and serene. This song is a Gospel Instrumental.
